attributes.action: Undertake Clandestine Observations of Operations in Slaughterhouses
attributes.additional_details:
Undercover inspectors to undertake observation of typical daily operations within slaughterhouses.

Ideally, I would like to see slaughterhouses abolished, but that isn't going to happen, so the aim is to identify unnecessary violence and cruelty against beasts and prosecute the guilt parties.

Publication of findings to be made public.
